price: 8. Pour qu’Il établisse la vérité et réduise à néant le mensonge, n’en déplaise aux criminels.
arabic: لِيُحِقَّ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَيُبۡطِلَ ٱلۡبَٰطِلَ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: liyuḥiqqa al-ḥaqa wayub'ṭila al-bāṭila walaw kariha al-muj'rimūna
